name: KeyboardEvent
description: An event generated by a keyboard action

content.name: modifier_key_statuses
content.description: modifier keys pressed on the keyboard during this event

content.name: workspace_point
content.description: the coordinate within virtual space where the action took place (dissimilar to the point on the screen, which is found within the "data" entry)

content.name: all_element_ids
content.description: all elements which are beneath the mouse cursor at the time of this action

content.name: relevant_element_ids
content.description: all elements which were set to receive mouse wheel events, filtered by the "Callback Activation Mode"
